document:
The incident happened near Dr Gray's Hospital shortly after 10:00.
The man was taken to the hospital with what police said were serious but not life-threatening injuries.
The A96 was closed in the area for several hours, but it has since reopened.
claim: a man has been taken to hospital after a two-vehicle crash on the a96 in county antrim.
